author: Megan Armstrong
title: Report: Roger Goodell Conducting NFL Draft from House Is 'Worst-Case Scenario'

content:

NBC Sports' Peter King wrote Sunday night that a "source with knowledge of draft-logistics discussions" told him the possibility of NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell conducting the 2020 draft from home through a remote-controlled camer… [+2459 chars]
